I sometimes get urges for a lot of different things like rape, yaoi, futa, hell sometimes even guro but never netorare. Before that it was a total turnoff for me, i didnt want to spiral into depravity like a lot of hentai addicts do. and today while reading this series, at the scene where iida and niiyama were almost raped and again at the scenes where the college guy was having sex with them i just thought: "this aint doing it for me" im sure i dont not like netorare anymore but it's nice to know that it might have only been a phase. Anyway this series was pretty good, ending was strange and kinda cheap but all in all 7/10

Then his first sexual encounter ends up in a surprise, where they both watch their friends get it on, and he ends up coming watching while Iida comes. So, imprinting. I kinda expected it from MC while reading this since his shirt already gave out a hint: it said "cuc<old" or cuckold, so basically it wasn't the ending I was hoping for; as it turned out, MC is a cuck that fulfills his desire and love from hearing Iida getting railed by other men for inducing "painful & despicable feelings", the very definition of cuckolding ending. At least we know Yoshino (bald guy) got himself a gf, but we know nothing about Chino after the last fuck session with MC, which is a bit disappointing. After all, they love each other but are also sexual deviants.
This got even more sick than the first 2 volumes. I’m surprised at how messed up Iida ended up and how Chino and the bald MC served as a great contrast to the dark haired ones.

I like how convoluted their relationships are and it feels kinda bittersweet in a sense. I felt a bit of sympathy for Chino later in the story as she wasn't favored by the guys, they instead want Riho because she's got a tight pussy (ngl, a tight pussy is quite something, 'special' if you've experienced one). Pretty well-written, not perfect but good enough to enjoy, yes it has NTR elements and such but it was a nice adult read. Oh, I can't leave this out: ART IS LIKE A FUCKING MASTERPIECE! Just reading through, I've had a stiff boner and got myself wet often from reading this series cuz of the amazing artwork, so fucking good! I love it, this is one of the few works where I don't hate NTR even though I was hoping for a different ending.

If theres one thing I have to say I FREAKING LOVE THIS SERIES .

Its my go-to fap material for when I wanna have a quick nut especially on vol.2 where baldy gets to have a threesome . I eager waited for the 3rd volume for months until it was released on NO NUT NOVEMBER of all places . 

During that time , this series won No.1 on Fanza and many various sites to the point that that vol.1 got turned int oa live-action JAV and by following the creator on twitter , he managed to pass the story to someone  and remake it as a manga about teenage sexual curiosity and  indulgence ( minus the NTR ) conveniently titled Zakari Karami or "My truth and your lies" . 

I would say reading Vol.3 is definitely a let down as they could've made this a totally NTR thing and showed the progress between all four of our characters or at least a few more contextual scenes between MC and FMC but overall it is what it is . 

My ranking would still be : 1) Vol2 , 2) Vol1 and 3) Vol 3
